text: After living alone for many years, you feel lonely. Your child/children have not been contacting you in a while, do you call your son/daughter or not?

yes.text: You chat on the phone for a long while, making up for all the lost time.

no.text: You donâ€™t want to bother your child/children. Many elderly in sg feel lonely as they have no one to contact.

text: As you feel ill, do you go for cheaper traditional Chinese medicine (TCM), or more expensive Western medicine?

yes.text: You go to the nearest TCM store and bought some herbs. After consuming them, you question their effectiveness.

no.text: You go to the nearest polyclinic. After consuming your prescribed and expensive drugs, you feel much better.
